summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Plat 232W, page 26 of the Official Land Use Map, to rezone property located at 906 North 96th Street from Single Family 5000 (SF5000) to Lowrise 3 (L3) and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Berhane Mehary, C.F. 299930, Appl. 9304865)
committee: Housing, Community Development and Urban Environment
